thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Moelis & Co Reports Q4 Adj Earnings Per Share $0.52

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Moelis & Co Reports Q4 Adj Earnings Per Share $0.52
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Moelis & Co:
* MPANY REPORTS FULL YEAR AND FOURTH QUARTER 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS; DECLARES SPECIAL DIVIDEND OF $1.50 PER SHARE AND INCREASES REGULAR QUARTERLY DIVIDEND TO $0.47 PER SHARE
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.52 * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.72 * Q4 REVENUE FELL 17 PERCENT TO $169.2 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.42, REVENUE VIEW $160.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
